text: Apani ki munaphikaderake dekhenani? Tara kitabidera madhye yara kuphari kareche tadera sesaba bha'ike bale, â€˜tomara yadi bahiskrta ha'o, amara abasya'i tomadera sathe desatyagi haba ebam amara tomadera byapare kakhano karo katha manabo na ebam yadi tomara akranta ha'o amara abasya'i tomaderake sahayya karaba.â€™ Ara allaha saksya dicchena ye, niscaya tara mithyabadi
